quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
name: Frank A. Clark

quote: My father was my teacher. But most importantly he was a great dad.
name: Beau Bridges

quote: The most important influence in my childhood was my father.
name: DeForest Kelley

quote: I hope I can be as good of a father to my son as my dad was to me.
name: Calvin Johnson

quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood.
name: Buffalo Bill

quote: My brother Bob doesn't want to be in government - he promised Dad he'd go straight.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: My dad has given me the best gift anyone has ever given me. He gave me wings to fly.
name: Adria Arjona

quote: Dad, wherever you are, you are gone but you will never be forgotten.
name: Conrad Hall

quote: Dad is and always will be my living, breathing superhero.
name: Bindi Irwin

quote: I just wish I could understand my father.
name: Michael Jackson

quote: Whoever does not have a good father should procure one.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: My Father had a profound influence on me. He was a lunatic.
name: Spike Milligan

quote: When one has not had a good father, one must create one.
name: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I love my dad, and I'm proud to be his daughter.
name: Paris Jackson

quote: The child is father of the man.
name: William Wordsworth

quote: It's an ongoing joy being a dad.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: My dad's my best mate, and he always will be.
name: Cher Lloyd

quote: Without my dad, I wouldn't be here.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: I want my kids to see me as Dad, for God's sake, not a television personality.
name: Gordon Ramsay

quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
name: Margaret Mead

quote: My dad wouldn't buy me tight pants. I had to get my own money to buy them.
name: Young Thug

quote: I'm dying to be a great dad one day, whenever that day comes.
name: Drake

quote: I hope I am remembered by my children as a good father.
name: Orson Scott Card

quote: I have great genes. Thank you to my mom and dad for that one.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: My dad was such a great story-teller, a good teacher.
name: Grace Poe

quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
name: Pope John XXIII

quote: I grew up with a truck. My dad had one, so I like trucks.
name: Lucas Till

quote: My dad always said that hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard enough.
name: Katee Sackhoff

quote: When I was three years old, my dad bought me my first drum set.
name: Travis Scott

quote: My mom used to get arrested for being with my dad. She would get fined. She would spend weekends in jail.
name: Trevor Noah

quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
name: Bertrand Russell

quote: I have never been jealous. Not even when my dad finished fifth grade a year before I did.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: When your dad's a cop, calling 911 is really just like calling Dad at work.
name: Ryan Reynolds

quote: My dad was the town drunk. Most of the time that's not so bad; but New York City?
name: Henny Youngman

quote: As Daddy said, life is 95 percent anticipation.
name: Gloria Swanson

quote: If my father had hugged me even once, I'd be an accountant right now.
name: Ray Romano

quote: My dad worked two jobs his whole life, and so I told him he's the reason I have 20 jobs.
name: Magic Johnson

quote: I have great faith that Heaven's there and I'll see my brothers and my mom and dad when I get there.
name: Ernie Harwell

quote: My dad's not here, but he's watching in heaven.
name: Bubba Watson

quote: I'm not going anywhere. My dad lived to be 102. And we've got Super Bowls to win.
name: Bob McNair

quote: My dad was a movie star. Having that name was good and bad. People think it's a silver spoon. It's not.
name: Michael Douglas

quote: I have always thought of Walt Disney as my second father.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: My dad thinks I have a photographic memory.
name: Baker Mayfield

quote: Love and fear. Everything the father of a family says must inspire one or the other.
name: Joseph Joubert

quote: I wasn't born to a wealthy or powerful family - mother from Puerto Rico, dad from the South Bronx.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: I love my dad; I'm a daddy's girl, all the way.
name: Molly Quinn

quote: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him.
name: Eminem

quote: I grew up on the back of a motorcycle - my dad didn't have a car until I was a teenager.
name: Aisha Tyler

quote: My dad farmed, my granddad was a farmer. I wanted to be a farmer.
name: Sam Brownback

quote: My mother was very funny. My dad had a great sense of humor. My grandmother, too.
name: Carol Burnett

quote: My father was not a failure. After all, he was the father of a president of the United States.
name: Harry S Truman

quote: I'm compared to my dad all the time, and I've learned to take it positively by working hard.
name: Ram Charan

quote: I know my dad always wanted to heal the world, and so I think it would be great to follow in his footsteps.
name: Paris Jackson

quote: My dad used to say, 'Just because you dress up in a coat and tie, it doesn't influence your intelligence.'
name: Tiger Woods

quote: I was built up from my dad more than anyone else.
name: John Wooden

quote: My dad was an entrepreneurial businessman, and maybe I got some of his ability.
name: Thomas Jane

quote: My dad had a church of 90 people when I was born. It was just, over the years it continued to grow.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: I didn't try to copy my dad or fit into the pressure or the mold that everybody tried to make me fit into.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position.
name: Bill Gates

quote: My mom and my dad were both very sociable, meeting lots of interesting people.
name: Bill Gates

quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern.
name: Anais Nin

quote: My mom worked for Apple, and my dad owned his own business.
name: Travis Scott

quote: My dad is a great writer. Naturally talented, naturally charming. He embodies that back-in-the-day cool.
name: Drake

quote: I never saw any of my dad's stories. My mother said he had piles and piles of manuscripts.
name: Stephen King

quote: It is impossible to please all the world and one's father.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: I'm a dad, I'm a husband, I'm an activist, I'm a writer and I'm just a student of the world.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: I am blessed to have Mom and Dad.
name: Kevin Eubanks

quote: My dad was always playing music. Not, like, playing music but listening to music.
name: Post Malone

quote: My dad never missed a day of work, and he was always smiling when he came home.
name: Patty Loveless

quote: My dad was a big admirer of Sergeant York stories from the First World War.
name: Clint Eastwood

quote: My dad only ever talked about two things: bicycles and Mercedes.
name: Raf Simons

quote: I want to be a young dad. By 25 or 26 I want to see myself, like, married or start looking for a family.
name: Justin Bieber

quote: I always wanted what Mom and Dad had.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: My dad being a salesman taught me you can sell anybody anything if you've got the ability to believe.
name: Marilyn Manson

quote: My daughter doesn't even get my humor. She's like, 'Um, no. I don't get it, Dad. Mmm, no, not that one, Dad.'
name: Kevin Hart

quote: My dad says he likes to bask in my glow.
name: Robert Pattinson

quote: I don't think my dad ever raised his voice to my mother or to me, ever.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: My father and I have a very good relationship. We always got along. But I always scold him.
name: Amy Sedaris

quote: My mother and dad played the fiddle and the guitar.
name: Gordie Howe

quote: God and my dad gave me the gift of gab. I know how to finagle.
name: Chance The Rapper

quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: My dad is a motorcycle guy, not some Hollywood dude.
name: Shia LaBeouf

quote: When my first semester grades came out, my mom and dad told me I wouldn't be playing football.
name: Joe Biden

quote: Shortly after my dad died, my mom figured that if I could do a few commercials, I'd get a college fund.
name: Liam Aiken

quote: It was my dream playing for the Montreal Canadiens - it was my dad's team.
name: Guy Lafleur

quote: I recruited my dad to be my bass player and fired him on several occasions. He stayed on as a bus driver.
name: Chely Wright

quote: Everybody wanna be a super dad and the best dad ever, but sometimes, I'm just realizing that I'm not perfect.
name: Future

quote: Making your dad happy is - especially for an Italian Catholic girl, I'll tell you - it feels really good.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: My father... had sharper eyes than the rest of our people.
name: Chief Joseph

quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers.
name: Horace

quote: An angry father is most cruel towards himself.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: When I was young, I was the kid who would call my dad from a slumber party to beg him to come pick me up.
name: Kendall Jenner

quote: My dad gave me the gene to enjoy cooking, and to enjoy consuming good food and wine.
name: Danny Meyer

quote: I'm absolutely my dad's biggest fan, and anything he wanted to do, I wanted to be a part of.
name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

quote: My dad believes in God, I think. I'm not sure if my mom does. I don't.
name: Daniel Radcliffe

quote: When I was about 12 years old back in Houston, my Dad used to take us to the driving range.
name: Ron White

quote: All the learnin' my father paid for was a bit o' birch at one end and an alphabet at the other.
name: George Eliot

quote: My dad was like a stage mother he always pushed me to do what I wanted.
name: Jim Carrey

quote: I like all the angels around because they protect me and my daughter. I mean, her Dad's an angel.
name: Courtney Love

quote: My dad always taught me to never be satisfied, to want more and know that what is done is done.
name: Thierry Henry

quote: I love being a dad. I just love it.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: My dad had been born in Mexico and his family had to leave during the Mexican revolution.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: I wanted to be a police officer for a long time so I could be just like my dad!
name: Doreen Cronin

quote: My dad's an architect and my mom owned a French bakery for twelve years.
name: Alison Lohman

quote: I'm a lot like my dad: a little bit of a daredevil. I like an adrenaline rush.
name: Lynsi Torres

quote: My dad just wanted me to find something to do to keep me out of trouble. Boxing was the great escape.
name: Diego Corrales

quote: My coaches were great. My mom and dad. My dad never missed a wrestling meet.
name: Dan Gable

quote: People said, 'How could you walk away from music?' But being a dad - there's nothing that can touch that.
name: Garth Brooks

quote: Whenever I fail as a father or husband... a toy and a diamond always works.
name: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: I went and worked for my dad after school. I'd show up late and stuff like that.
name: Chris Farley

quote: The whole thought of being a dad was scary to me.
name: Paul Walker

quote: My dad gave up his job; he stopped working - for me. Without that, I definitely wouldn't be as successful.
name: Chloe Kim

quote: My dad was a particularly polite kind of guy, very courteous.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: My dad, bless him, was a musician. And his dad had thought that his music was rubbish.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: Looking back, I think I was always musical. My dad was very musical, and I think my mom was musical.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: My dad was a terrible businessman.
name: Al Franken

quote: My dad was the first man I ever loved.
name: Adrienne C. Moore

quote: My dad passed away when I was 10.
name: Sterling K. Brown

quote: My dad was actually a college boxer at L.S.U. and a good one, too. He was the captain of the boxing team.
name: James Carville

quote: My dad is very down to earth, and I view him as a creative genius, and I am very proud of that.
name: Dylan Lauren

quote: Attraction doesn't stop when a child is born. It's the opposite. Being a mum and dad makes you even sexier.
name: Orlando Bloom

quote: It is much easier to become a father than to be one.
name: Kent Nerburn

quote: My dad was a janitor for U.S. Radium Corporation, and he stayed there for 37 years. So he didn't read.
name: Walter Dean Myers

quote: I promised my dad before he passed away that I would take care of the family.
name: Luis Coronel

quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.
name: Imelda Marcos

quote: My dad was a crazy person, but some of the best qualities about me came from him.
name: Jillian Michaels

quote: My dad was always supportive of me and my skating, and he loved me as best that he could, and he worked hard.
name: Tonya Harding

quote: My role model is my dad.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: My mom and my dad are ebullient people, and I think I carry that with me.
name: Michael Stuhlbarg

quote: I didn't always want to be a dad.
name: Liam Gallagher

quote: Dressing up used to be more of a thing. My dad wore a suit always. Now you think, why bother?
name: Geena Davis

quote: My mum and dad used to make me stand up at dinner parties and sing to their friends.
name: Sam Smith

quote: My Dad was from Liverpool, and he picked it up in the army. He'd often come out with this stuff.
name: Mike Myers

quote: Humor is always based on a modicum of truth. Have you ever heard a joke about a father-in-law?
name: Dick Clark

quote: A dramatic thing, the first time you stand up to your dad.
name: Lenny Kravitz

quote: My mum was quite poor, and my dad was rich. She didn't dig that, so she left him.
name: Kevin Parker

quote: My dad didn't drive - the only dad I knew who didn't.
name: Julie Burchill

quote: My dad was traveling a lot, but when he would come home and cook, he'd cook pizza.
name: Hilary Knight

quote: They have had such a crazy life living with me as their dad. Not crazy but different from their friends.
name: Sebastian Bach

quote: I pop gum. My parents get so annoyed with me. I know my dad wishes he never taught me how to do that.
name: Hilary Duff

quote: I respect my dad, and he's amazing. He's my hero. He's the Beatles, man - or one of them.
name: James McCartney

quote: My dad left when I was 3 1/2, and he left my mom and I.
name: David Cassidy

quote: My dad was a very strong man, very stubborn as well.
name: Paul Pogba

quote: Becoming a dad means you have to be a role model for your son and be someone he can look up to.
name: Wayne Rooney

quote: As a family, we were always active. Lots of walking, lots of running as well as riding bikes with dad.
name: Alistair Brownlee

quote: I've got my dad's height and smoking habit. But I think I've got my mum's looks and sensibilities.
name: Max Irons

quote: My dad is a builder, and my mum's a nurse. They're just very normal people.
name: Greg Rutherford

quote: My mom works in funerals, and my dad works at Burger King.
name: Kelly Marie Tran

quote: My dad is afraid of my laugh.
name: Halston Sage

quote: I want to stay healthy, keep fit, eat well, keep a low profile and be a good dad.
name: Frank Bruno

quote: My dad is a great manager. He's not just competent - he's very clever.
name: Nico Rosberg

quote: My dad was born with no money.
name: Courtney A. Kemp

quote: My dad used to say, 'Just be yourself and you'll be fine,' but it's really, really true.
name: Bellamy Young

quote: Truthfully, I'm still Corey Hart, Dad, first.
name: Corey Hart

quote: I was punished for blowing the whistle on my father's lifestyle.
name: Tatum O'Neal

quote: My dad has been playing guitar basically all his life. He's sort of who got me into rock music.
name: Dylan Minnette

quote: I'm a hands-on dad.
name: Eric Dane

quote: I only started singing at about 15, and it came as quite a surprise to my dad.
name: Romy Madley Croft

quote: Dad was very into electronics, robotics and computers, so I was interested in what he was doing.
name: Rhianna Pratchett

quote: My Dad was so open creatively that I was off in search of black turtleneck bathing suits with long sleeves.
name: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: My dad was an inventor, and I think I've always had a rosy view of technology, or at least its potential.
name: Scott McCloud

quote: Some musicians I know are incredible fathers. Like Keith Richards. A fantastic dad.
name: Jack Bruce

quote: I come from good stock. Both of my parents are big - my dad is a big guy; my mom is a big lady.
name: Frank Thomas

quote: My dad always said, 'Don't worry what people think, because you can't change it.'
name: Daisy Donovan

quote: Being a father to my family and a husband is to me much more important than what I did in the business.
name: Tom Bosley

quote: My dad never gave me pats on the back or congratulations. There was always more to give and more to get done.
name: Stefon Diggs

quote: I just wasn't cut out to be a Chinese Tiger Mom. I'm more of an Irish Setter Dad.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: My dad is the nicest guy you'll ever meet, and the easiest going.
name: Serena Williams

quote: My dad is a marketing mastermind.
name: Serena Williams

quote: I think my dad is a lot cooler than other dads. He still acts like he's still 17.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: My dad says I could sing before I could talk, if that's possible. I was always humming and things like that.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: My dad, like, he's the most trusting human in the world.
name: Miley Cyrus

quote: What I do now is all my dad's fault, because he bought me a guitar as a boy, for no apparent reason.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: My dad bought me a guitar and people would ask me to play.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: My father was grounded, a very meat-and-potatoes man. He was a baker.
name: Anthony Hopkins

quote: There is too much fathering going on just now and there is no doubt about it fathers are depressing.
name: Gertrude Stein

quote: My father wouldn't get us a TV, he wouldn't allow a TV in the house.
name: Janis Joplin

quote: I have my dad's shape. No booty.
name: Queen Latifah

quote: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: The time not to become a father is eighteen years before a war.
name: E. B. White

quote: My father never raised his hand to any one of his children, except in self-defense.
name: Fred Allen

quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful.
name: Cindy Crawford

quote: Nobody ever asks a father how he manages to combine marriage and a career.
name: Sam Ewing

quote: Father told me that if I ever met a lady in a dress like yours, I must look her straight in the eyes.
name: Prince Charles

quote: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out.
name: Jay London

quote: My father was never anti-anything in our house.
name: Errol Flynn

quote: I was raised by free-spirited people, though my father gave me a very strong work ethic.
name: Diane Lane

quote: The surprising thing about fatherhood was finding my inner mush. Now I want to share it with the world.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table.
name: James Levine

quote: I'm a soccer dad at heart. I want five kids, and I want to get married. I want to coach Little League.
name: Mekhi Phifer

quote: Growing up, I saw my dad do charity work for children with health issues. That had a profound effect on me.
name: David Boreanaz

quote: I grew up not liking my father very much. I never saw him cry. But he must have. Everybody cries.
name: Charley Pride

quote: My father, he was like the rock, the guy you went to with every problem.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: One Christmas my father kept our tree up till March. He hated to see it go. I loved that.
name: Mo Rocca

quote: My father wants me to be like my brother, but I can't be.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: I would never have done what I'd done if I'd considered my father as somebody I wanted to please.
name: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: Being a father, being a friend, those are the things that make me feel successful.
name: William Hurt

quote: My father was something of a rainbow-chaser.
name: Marc Davis

quote: Thirteen, 13 children, and I love - I love them all. And I think I've been a good father to all of them.
name: Anthony Quinn

quote: What harsh judges fathers are to all young men!
name: Terence

quote: My father loved people, children and pets.
name: Tony Visconti

quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family - the provider for all, and the enemy of all.
name: August Strindberg

quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of.
name: Amy Heckerling

quote: My father was the guy on the block who said hi to everyone.
name: Damon Wayans

quote: Rich men's sons are seldom rich men's fathers.
name: Herbert Kaufman

quote: It will be amazing to collaborate with my dad. It will be special.
name: Armaan Malik

quote: My father was an Episcopalian minister, and I've always been comforted by the power of prayer.
name: Anna Lee

quote: Child-rearing is my main interest now. I'm a hands-on father.
name: Sean Penn

quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
name: Enid Bagnold

quote: I'm a fun father, but not a good father. The hard decisions always went to my wife.
name: John Lithgow

quote: Dad was the only adult male I ever trusted.
name: Michael Reagan

quote: Because of my father, we are that Shining City on a Hill.
name: Michael Reagan

quote: One of my earliest memories is of my father carrying me in one arm with a picket sign in the other.
name: Camryn Manheim

quote: My dad taught me true words you have to use in every relationship. Yes, baby.
name: Star Jones

quote: My father taught me how to substitute realities.
name: Mira Sorvino

quote: My dad loved black singers. So listening to New Orleans music, eventually I wanted to play an instrument.
name: Bill Kreutzmann

quote: My father was the most rational and the most dispassionate of men.
name: Simon Newcomb

quote: No, I never thought about my father's money as my money.
name: Christie Hefner

quote: As a little girl I used to daydream about my real father coming on a white horse to rescue me.
name: Christine Keeler

quote: I caught the acting bug from my dad.
name: Finn Wittrock

quote: A father's disappointment can be a very powerful tool.
name: Michael Bergin

quote: My father was always telling himself no one was perfect, not even my mother.
name: Broderick Crawford

quote: Father or stepfather - those are just titles to me. They don't mean anything.
name: Oliver Hudson

quote: Fathers in today's modern families can be so many things.
name: Oliver Hudson

quote: No man is responsible for his father. That was entirely his mother's affair.
name: Margaret Turnbull
